title: Batch is not processed beacon node doesn't have a parent in db
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description A clear and concise description of the problem... When running this command to start the beacon chain, I'm getting the warning that Batch is not processed error=beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: ./prysm.sh beacon-chain --http-web3provider=https://goerli.infura.io/v3/... --pyrmont ### Has this worked before in a previous version? Yes, the previous version in which this bug was not present was: .... ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction ## üî• Error 



./prysm.sh beacon-chain --http-web3provider=https://goerli.infura.io/v3/projecID --pyrmont
Latest Prysm version is v1.4.4.
Beacon chain is up to date.
Verifying binary integrity.

gpg: Good signature from "Preston Van Loon " [unknown]
gpg: WARNING: This key is not certified with a trusted signature!
gpg:          There is no indication that the signature belongs to the owner.

Starting Prysm beacon-chain --http-web3provider=https://goerli.infura.io/v3/projectID --pyrmont
[2021-09-03 21:27:23]  WARN flags: Running on Pyrmont Testnet
[2021-09-03 21:27:23]  INFO node: Checking DB database-path=/home/name/.eth2/beaconchaindata
[2021-09-03 21:27:23]  INFO node: Deposit contract: 0x8c5fecdc472e27bc447696f431e425d02dd46a8c
[2021-09-03 21:27:27]  INFO initial-sync: Waiting for state to be initialized
[2021-09-03 21:27:27]  INFO node: Starting beacon node version=Prysm/v1.4.4/29d48dfe7eb38959752048aec700f31c3abf7484. Built at: 2021-09-01 16:20:28+00:00
[2021-09-03 21:27:27]  INFO rpc: gRPC server listening on port address=127.0.0.1:4000
[2021-09-03 21:27:27]  WARN rpc: You are using an insecure gRPC server. If you are running your beacon node and validator on the same machines, you can ignore this message. If you want to know how to enable secure connections, see: https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/prysm-usage/secure-grpc
[2021-09-03 21:27:27]  INFO gateway: Starting API middleware API middleware address=127.0.0.1:3501
[2021-09-03 21:27:27]  INFO gateway: Starting gRPC gateway address=127.0.0.1:3500
[2021-09-03 21:27:27]  INFO blockchain: Blockchain data already exists in DB, initializing...
[2021-09-03 21:27:28]  INFO powchain: Connected to eth1 proof-of-work chain endpoint=https://goerli.infura.io/***
[2021-09-03 21:27:28]  INFO slotutil: Chain genesis time reached genesisStateRoot=eccac996d92ce12bd7d071d331b930ef21375e3a3db83fa62140a9ef50340a14 genesisTime=2020-11-18 05:00:07 -0700 MST genesisValidators=100010
[2021-09-03 21:27:28]  INFO initial-sync: Starting initial chain sync...
[2021-09-03 21:27:28]  INFO initial-sync: Waiting for enough suitable peers before syncing required=3 suitable=0
[2021-09-03 21:27:28]  INFO p2p: Started discovery v5 ENR=enr:-LK4QG1qxW3KCLzvmS616kUvUnK4pZg6UKNGGeUYT7LrRfCOMWcgCQaRlxPQvt9_GyZj_0BGXcpmcNC-KlE5A3SpYcEBh2F0dG5ldHOIAAAAAAAAAACEZXRoMpA7CIeVAAAgCf__________gmlkgnY0gmlwhMCoAPaJc2VjcDI1NmsxoQNykDk4CvgZ1RW5XLyV9tAfMrBaiyj6zZzDb537rTlGFoN0Y3CCMsiDdWRwgi7g
[2021-09-03 21:27:28]  INFO p2p: Node started p2p server multiAddr=/ip4/192.168.0.246/tcp/13000/p2p/16Uiu2HAmLNCP1AqVuXkpTUvCB9JdEw7FXJtJJBjL2VjeAhNznCL5
[2021-09-03 21:27:34]  INFO rpc: New gRPC client connected to beacon node addr=127.0.0.1:55882
[2021-09-03 21:27:34]  INFO initial-sync: Processing block batch of size 45 starting from  0x30c04689... 1/2085437 - estimated time remaining 257h27m40s blocksPerSecond=2.2 peers=5
[2021-09-03 21:27:34]  WARN initial-sync: Batch is not processed error=beacon node doesn't have a parent in db with root: 0x6a89af5df908893eedbed10ba4c13fc13d5653ce57db637e3bfded73a987bb87
## üåç Your Environment OpenSuse
**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)** 
  
1.4.4
**Anything else relevant (validator index / public key)?**

figured out my problem downloaded the genesis.ssz from: 
https://github.com/eth2-clients/eth2-networks/blob/master/shared/pyrmont/genesis.ssz
and ran it with the following flags:  --genesis-state=/path to downloaded genesis file/genesis.ssz --clear-db

@ptn77, you also need to use the pre-release version of Prysm for Pyrmont or Prater. Please use v2.0.0-rc.1.

Thanks!
